name: Global Infosoft Solutions
overview:
Global Infosoft Solutions - software development company established in the year 2006.Our core competencies are PHP, MySql, OsCommerce, Joomla, WordPress, ZenCart in the web designing and development.

The professionals at GIS are skilled and will help to build a competitive solution from the client’s perspective.

We have expert resources in the following areas,

PHP: We have trained and certified PHP developers. They have handled all kinds of PHP related coding, Bug Fixing, and have innovative ideas on bringing the logical outputs required for the critical project.

MySql: Our Certified MySql database developers and administrators have brought in many normalized databases with minimal time periods for many projects involving PHP and MySql.

Open Source Products: GIS has experienced people in handling the open source products such OsCommerce, Drupal, WordPress, Joomla and Zencart. Have accomplished many customization and the work done by them so far had been organized in the portfolio section of the profile. The clients can have a look at the portfolio items for a detailed study on the products customized by our GIS consultants.

Photoshop: We have an innovative team of web designing who can bring out an excellent design items with the help of the Photoshop Software tool. All GIS Web Designers are certified professionals.

Logo Designing: GIS have skilled persons in bringing out a good logo, based on the clients requirement and thoughts. We promise a delivery of the product with client’s full satisfaction o the logo.

MS Office experts: All Our GIS employees are experienced in handling the MS office based projects. We deal in both the versions (2003 and 2007) of MS Office packages and the details of the individual services provided are as follows,

MS Office Excel MS Office Word MS Office Access MS Office Powerpoint MS Office Visio

GIS helps in managing your project from concept to completion with a proper communication and adhering to the Project scope, Time and Budget. We deliver a quality product fulfilling the client’s expectation.

GIS professionals are available round the clock to meet the clients and gather requirements. Our professionals make a thorough analysis on the requirements and carry on with the development work.

All projects will have a design documents on how the requirements are to be carried forward.

We follow a strict time sheet, to track the work done for a project, on a daily basis. We submit the timesheets to the clients for all the projects, based on their requests.
